title: altchiefmaster
author: altchiefmaster
content: Welcome to the Evolution of Passive Income. Creating a brand new Ecosystem of utilities all designed to generate additional token volume which will generate additional passive income for all the holders. PIS token offer passive stable-coin income via its innovative token distribution strategy and advanced tokenomics. The passive income you receive will vary depending on the total amount of PIS token you hold and the token's daily trading volume.
